thread.title: Staff were accommodating and very attentive
thread.title_full: Staff were accommodating and very attentive - Review of Hyatt Union Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: DCW L
title: Staff were accommodating and very attentive
text:
We had a great stay as the staff were very helpful with all our needs, the room was well equipped for our needs and the location was perfect. This is our fourth time staying here and I have nothing but great things to say about the staff and service.
Room Tip: away from elevator See more room tips
